name: Floating Shackles
description:
Made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Can be played with WASD/ARROW KEYS and the SPACEBAR.

You control a simple black pixel that wants to break free from his floating platform. You can jump on top of it or you can wall jump with it.

Black platform = 3 jumps or wall jumps.

Blue platform = One big jump or 3 walljump. 

Green Platform = Infinite jumps and walljumps and it moves on its own to the right.

Red platform = Deadly
